title: Addition Property
text: The addition property of inequality: if $$a \geq b$$, then $$a+c \geq b+c$$
speech: The addition property of inequality: if  a is greater than or equal to, b , then  a, plus c is greater than or equal to, b plus c
pacedSpeech: The addition property of inequality: if   a is greater than or equal to, b
, then   a, plus c is greater than or equal to, b plus c

title: Applying the Addition Property
text: Our goal is to isolate $$x$$ (have $$x$$ on one side and numbers on the other side)
speech: Our goal is to isolate  x  (have  x,  on one side and numbers on the other side)
pacedSpeech: Our goal is to isolate   x
on one side and numbers on the other side)

title: Applying the Addition Property
text: What number should we add to both sides of the inequality to isolate $$x$$?
speech: What number should we add to both sides of the inequality to isolate  x ?

title: Left side
text: What is the left side after adding 1?

title: Right side
